welcome_message_title: Welcome to Bad Munder am Deister
welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bad Munder am Deister! Allow yourself to be enchanted by our charming city known for its beautiful nature and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hanover Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Hanover Airport, mostly used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport for up to 3 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Finkenwerder Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Finkenwerder Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
